attributes.background: This is because for some people it is extremely difficult to afford this huge sum of money despite the existence of student loans etc.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining what figure you want university fees to be reduced to.

Here are some open petitions asking for the Government to reduce university fees for students: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/163771

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/142465
